description: Enabling this will register your site on a central relay server to send push notifications for all installed apps through Firebase Cloud Messaging. This server only stores user tokens and error logs, and no messages are saved.

fields.description: API Key and Secret to interact with the relay server. These will be auto-generated when the first push notification is sent from any of the apps installed on this site.
fields.label: Authentication

fields.description: Enabling this will register your site on a central relay server to send push notifications for all installed apps through Firebase Cloud Messaging. This server only stores user tokens and error logs, and no messages are saved.
fields.label: Relay Settings

name: Push Notification Settings
